short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects if you are accessing localhost or production and respectively shows prominent red banner only on localhost.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It checks the following in the URL and adds the red banner:
1. "localhost"
2. "127.0.0.1"
3. "local."
4. ".local"
5. "staging."
6. ".stg"
7. "dev."
8. "test."
9. ".test"


Let me know, if you want to add any other string that should match and show the red banner.
